tool_description: Creates SMART (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound) learning goals based on assessment results and identified developmental needs.

goal_timeframe.description: Target timeframe for goals: short_term, medium_term, long_term

priority_domains.description: Domains to prioritize for goal setting

difficulty_level.description: Goal challenge level: conservative, appropriate, ambitious

error_messages: Invalid profile ID: Profile not found in system
Invalid gap analysis ID: Gap analysis not found
Invalid timeframe: Use short_term, medium_term, or long_term
Invalid domain: Use cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, or adaptive
Invalid number of goals: Must be between 1 and 8
Invalid difficulty level: Use conservative, appropriate, or ambitious
usage: Generate developmentally appropriate SMART goals based on gap analysis results. Specify timeframe and priority domains to focus goal-setting efforts.

learning_goals.description: Array of SMART learning goals with specific criteria

target_dates.description: Target achievement dates for each goal

measurement_criteria.description: How progress toward each goal will be measured

goal_categories.description: Developmental domain category for each goal

prerequisite_skills.description: Skills that should be developed to support goal achievement
